column33: WB & Disney need to publicly apologize to Johnny Depp
column34:
Warner Brothers and Disney both released Johnny Depp from his roles as Grindelwald in Fantastic Beasts and the iconic Capt Jack Sparrow in the Pirates of the Caribbean movies after wrongful allegations of domestic abuse against his now ex-wife Amber Heard. 

The movie studios never gave Mr. Depp a chance to tell his side of the story. They thought him guilty without letting him try to prove his innocence.

We, his fans; or as he likes to reference us, relatives, demand an apology for Mr. Depp from both studios!

Give him the respect he so rightfully deserves!
